00060 static inline 
00061 double get_delta_C( const PatchData& pd,
00062                     const std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00063                     MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   if (indices.empty()) {
00066     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00067     return 0.0;
00068   }
00069 
00070   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator beg, iter, iter2, end;
00071   
00072   std::vector<size_t> tmp_vect;
00073   if (indices.size() == 1u) {
00074     pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices( indices.front(), tmp_vect, err );
00075     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00076     assert(!tmp_vect.empty());
00077     tmp_vect.push_back( indices.front() );
00078     beg = tmp_vect.begin();
00079     end = tmp_vect.end();
00080   }
00081   else {
00082     beg = indices.begin();
00083     end = indices.end();
00084   }
00085   
00086   double min_dist_sqr = HUGE_VAL, sum_dist_sqr = 0.0;
00087   for (iter = beg; iter != end; ++iter) {
00088     for (iter2 = iter+1; iter2 != end; ++iter2) {
00089       Vector3D diff = pd.vertex_by_index(*iter);
00090       diff -= pd.vertex_by_index(*iter2);
00091       double dist_sqr = diff % diff;
00092       if (dist_sqr < min_dist_sqr)
00093         min_dist_sqr = dist_sqr;
00094       sum_dist_sqr += dist_sqr;
00095     }
00096   }
00097   
00098   return 3e-6*sqrt(min_dist_sqr) + 5e-7*sqrt(sum_dist_sqr/(end-beg));
00099 }

00101 
00102 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00103                               size_t handle,
00104                               double& value,
00105                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00106                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00107                               MsqError& err )
00108 {
00109   indices.clear();
00110   bool valid = evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err);
00111   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00112     return false;
00113   if (indices.empty())
00114     return true;
00115 
00116     // get initial pertubation amount
00117   double delta_C = finiteDiffEps;
00118   if (!haveFiniteDiffEps) {
00119     delta_C = get_delta_C( pd, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00120     if (keepFiniteDiffEps) {
00121       finiteDiffEps = delta_C;
00122       haveFiniteDiffEps = true;
00123     }
00124   }
00125   const double delta_inv_C = 1.0/delta_C;
00126   const int reduction_limit = 15;
00127 
00128   gradient.resize( indices.size() );
00129   for (size_t v=0; v<indices.size(); ++v) 
00130   {
00131     const Vector3D pos = pd.vertex_by_index(indices[v]);
00132     
00133     /* gradient in the x, y, z direction */
00134     for (int j=0;j<3;++j) 
00135     {
00136       double delta = delta_C;
00137       double delta_inv = delta_inv_C;
00138       double metric_value;
00139       Vector3D delta_v( 0, 0, 0 );
00140       
00141         //perturb the node and calculate gradient.  The while loop is a
00142         //safety net to make sure the epsilon perturbation does not take
00143         //the element out of the feasible region.
00144       int counter = 0;
00145       for (;;) {
00146           // perturb the coordinates of the free vertex in the j direction
00147           // by delta       
00148         delta_v[j] = delta;
00149         pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos+delta_v, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00150 
00151           //compute the function at the perturbed point location
00152         valid = evaluate( pd, handle, metric_value, err);
00153         if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err) && valid) 
00154           break;
00155           
00156         if (++counter >= reduction_limit) {
00157           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Perturbing vertex by delta caused an inverted element.",
00158                           MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00159           return false;
00160         }
00161         
00162         delta*=0.1;
00163         delta_inv*=10.;
00164       }
00165         // put the coordinates back where they belong
00166       pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos, indices[v], err );
00167         // compute the numerical gradient
00168       gradient[v][j] = (metric_value - value) * delta_inv;
00169     } // for(j)
00170   } // for(indices)
00171   return true;
00172 }

00174 
00175 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00176                               size_t handle,
00177                               double& value,
00178                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00179                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00180                               std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00181                               MsqError& err )
00182 {
00183   indices.clear();
00184   gradient.clear();
00185   keepFiniteDiffEps = true;
00186   bool valid = evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, err );
00187   keepFiniteDiffEps = false;
00188   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid) {
00189     haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00190     return false;
00191   }
00192   if (indices.empty()){
00193     haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00194     return true;
00195   }
00196 
00197     // get initial pertubation amount
00198   double delta_C;
00199   if (haveFiniteDiffEps) {
00200     delta_C = finiteDiffEps;
00201   }
00202   else {
00203     delta_C = get_delta_C( pd, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00204   }
00205   assert(delta_C < 1e30);
00206   const double delta_inv_C = 1.0/delta_C;
00207   const int reduction_limit = 15;
00208 
00209   std::vector<Vector3D> temp_gradient( indices.size() );
00210   const int num_hess = indices.size() * (indices.size() + 1) / 2;
00211   Hessian.resize( num_hess );
00212   
00213   for (unsigned v = 0; v < indices.size(); ++v) {
00214     const Vector3D pos = pd.vertex_by_index(indices[v]);
00215     for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) { // x, y, and z
00216       double delta = delta_C;
00217       double delta_inv = delta_inv_C;
00218       double metric_value;
00219       Vector3D delta_v(0,0,0);
00220       
00221         // find finite difference for gradient
00222       int counter = 0;
00223       for (;;) {
00224         delta_v[j] = delta;
00225         pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos+delta_v, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00226         valid = evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, metric_value, indices, temp_gradient, err );
00227         if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err) && valid) 
00228           break;
00229         
00230         if (++counter >= reduction_limit) {
00231           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Algorithm did not successfully compute element's "
00232                            "Hessian.\n",MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00233           haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00234           return false;
00235         }
00236         
00237         delta *= 0.1;
00238         delta_inv *= 10.0;
00239       }
00240       pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00241       
00242         //compute the numerical Hessian
00243       for (unsigned w = 0; w <= v; ++w) {
00244           //finite difference to get some entries of the Hessian
00245         Vector3D fd( temp_gradient[w] );
00246         fd -= gradient[w];
00247         fd *= delta_inv;
00248           // For the block at position w,v in a matrix, we need the corresponding index
00249           // (mat_index) in a 1D array containing only upper triangular blocks.
00250         unsigned sum_w = w*(w+1)/2; // 1+2+3+...+w
00251         unsigned mat_index = w*indices.size() + v - sum_w;
00252         Hessian[mat_index][0][j] = fd[0];
00253         Hessian[mat_index][1][j] = fd[1];
00254         Hessian[mat_index][2][j] = fd[2];
00255       }
00256     }  // for(j)
00257   } // for(indices)
00258   haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00259   return true;
00260 }
00261 
00262 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00263                                 size_t handle,
00264                                 double& value,
00265                                 std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00266                                 std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00267                                 std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& Hessian_diagonal,
00268                                 MsqError& err )
00269 {
00270   bool rval = evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, tmpHess, err );
00271   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00272     return rval;
00273   size_t s = indices.size();
00274   Hessian_diagonal.resize( s );
00275   std::vector<Matrix3D>::const_iterator h = tmpHess.begin();
00276   for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
00277     Hessian_diagonal[i] = h->upper();
00278     h += s--;
00279   }
00280   return rval;
00281 }

00283 
00284 uint32_t QualityMetric::fixed_vertex_bitmap( PatchData& pd,
00285                                            const MsqMeshEntity* elem,
00286                                            std::vector<size_t>& indices )
00287 {
00288   indices.clear();
00289   uint32_t result = ~(uint32_t)0;
00290   unsigned num_vtx = elem->vertex_count();
00291   const size_t* vertices = elem->get_vertex_index_array();
00292   indices.clear();
00293   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00294     if (vertices[i] < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00295       indices.push_back( vertices[i] );
00296       result &= ~(uint32_t)(1<<i);
00297     }
00298   }
00299   return result;
00300 }

00302 
00303 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_gradients( EntityTopology elem_type,
00304                                           uint32_t fixed,
00305                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grads )
00306 {
00307   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( elem_type );
00308   unsigned r, w;
00309   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex && !(fixed & (1<<r)); ++r);
00310   for (w = r++; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00311     if (!(fixed & (1<<r))) {
00312       grads[w] = grads[r];
00313       ++w;
00314     }
00315   }
00316   grads.resize(w);
00317 }
00318 
00319 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_diagonals( EntityTopology type, 
00320                                           uint32_t fixed, 
00321                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grads,
00322                                           std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diags )
00323 {
00324   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00325   unsigned r, w;
00326   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex && !(fixed & (1<<r)); ++r);
00327   for (w = r++; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00328     if (!(fixed & (1<<r))) {
00329       grads[w] = grads[r];
00330       diags[w] = diags[r];
00331       ++w;
00332     }
00333   }
00334   grads.resize(w);
00335   diags.resize(w);
00336 }
00337 
00338 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_hessians( EntityTopology elem_type,
00339                                          uint32_t fixed,
00340                                          std::vector<Matrix3D>& hessians )
00341 {
00342   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( elem_type );
00343   unsigned r, c, i = 0, w = 0;
00344   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00345     if (fixed & (1<<r)) {
00346       i += num_vertex - r;
00347       continue;
00348     }
00349     for (c = r; c < num_vertex; ++c) {
00350       if (!(fixed & (1<<c))) {
00351         hessians[w] = hessians[i];
00352         ++w;
00353       }
00354       ++i;
00355     }
00356   }
00357   hessians.resize(w);
00358 }      
00359 
00360 double QualityMetric::weighted_average_metrics(const double coef[],
00361                                              const double metric_values[],
00362                                              const int& num_values, 
00363                                              MsqError &err)
00364 {
00365   //MSQ_MAX needs to be made global?
00366   //double MSQ_MAX=1e10;
00367   double total_value=0.0;
00368   int i=0;
00369   //if no values, return zero
00370   if (num_values<=0){
00371     return 0.0;
00372   }
00373 
00374   for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00375     total_value += coef[i]*metric_values[i];
00376   }
00377   total_value /= (double) num_values;
00378 
00379   return total_value;
00380 }
